name: 7WD – Score Sheet
description:
Do you play the amazing two-player card game 7 Wonders Duel? Have you run out of sheets on your score pad, or prefer not to use them? Would you like to keep an electronic running score sheet of all your wins (or losses)?

Then this is the app for you! Simple, easy to use and portable.

At the start of your first game, input the player names at the top of the score sheet.

At the end of a game, input all your scores as per the game instructions and the totals at the bottom will automatically add up to show you the final scores for each player and who's won the game.

To start a new game, press and hold on the 'total' icon at the bottom left of the screen. This will also update the overall running scores.

Running scores are shown in small to the right of the total scores. To reset these, simply edit either of the player's names at the top of the score sheet to begin a new DUEL!
